  themeVariables:
    xyChart:
      plotColorPalette: '#000000, #0000FF, #00FF00, #FF0000'
---
xychart
title "Different Colors in xyChart"
x-axis "categoriesX" ["Category 1", "Category 2", "Category 3", "Category 4"]
y-axis "valuesY" 0 --> 50
line [10,20,30,40]
bar [20,30,25,35]
bar [15,25,20,30]
line [5,15,25,35]
---
